                          com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.form.Radio
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable, com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener
public class Radio
extends CheckBox

Single radio field. Same as Checkbox, but provided as a convenience for automatically setting the input type. Radio grouping is handled automatically by the browser if you give each radio in a group the same name.

Inherited Events:
Field Focus
Field Blur
Field Change
Field Invalid
Field Valid
Field KeyPress
Field SpecialKey

setValue

public void setValue(java.lang.Boolean value)
Description copied from class: Field
Sets a data value into the field and validates it. If the field is rendered, To set the value directly without validation see Field.setRawValue(java.lang.String).

Overrides:
setValue in class CheckBox
Parameters:
value - the value to set
